violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
violations.help: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.html: Hva kan jeg hjelpe deg med?
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 1.8 (foreground color: #eaedef, background color: #a8b4bc, font size: 14.3pt (19px), font weight: bold). Expected contrast ratio of 3:1

violations.description: Ensure image alternative is not repeated as text
violations.help: Alternative text of images should not be repeated as text
